Package ca.bankonit.manager

Class BankManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.bankonit.manager.BankManager
  • public final class BankManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the Bank On It accounts and transactions.
    Version:
    Aug 3, 2021
    Author:
    Nick Hamnett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Account> accounts
      Holds Account objects in memory.

      The relative path to the accounts binary file.

      The relative path to the accounts comma separated values file.

      Holds Transaction objects in memory.
      static java.lang.String TRANSACTIONS_BINARY
      The relative path to the transactions binary file.
      static java.lang.String TRANSACTIONS_TEXT
      The relative path to the transactions comma separated values file.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public Account login​(long cardNumber,
                     short pin)
        Finds an Account with matching card number and PIN
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - Card number to search for
        pin - PIN to check
        Returns:
        Account instance if login is valid, otherwise, null.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw​(Account account,
                     double amount)
              throws InvalidAccountException
        Performs a withdraw transaction.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to withdraw from.
        amount - Amount to withdraw (this will be converted to positive if negative)
        Throws:
        InvalidAccountException - Thrown if account is null.

      • deposit

        public void deposit​(Account account,
                    double amount)
             throws InvalidAccountException
        Performs a deposit transaction.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to deposit to.
        amount - Amount to deposit (this will be converted to positive if negative)
        Throws:
        InvalidAccountException - Thrown if account is null.

      • getTransactionsForAccount

        public java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactionsForAccount​(Account account)
                                                           throws InvalidAccountException
        Gets transactions associated with an account
        Parameters:
        account - Account to get transactions for
        Returns:
        Transactions for account.
        Throws:
        InvalidAccountException - Thrown if account is null.

      • persist

        public void persist()
        Saves the accounts and transactions to random access files.

      • populateAccountsFromText

        private java.util.ArrayList<Account> populateAccountsFromText()
        Populates the accounts from the CSV file.
        Returns:
        Array list of Account objects

      • populateAccountsFromBinary

        private java.util.ArrayList<Account> populateAccountsFromBinary()
                                                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                java.io.IOException
        Populates accounts from random access file.
        Returns:
        Array list of Account objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if ACCOUNTS_BINARY doesn't exist.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an error occurs reading file.

      • populateTransactionsFromText

        private java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> populateTransactionsFromText()
        Populates transactions from CSV file.
        Returns:
        Array list of Transaction objects

      • populateTransactionsFromBinary

        private java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> populateTransactionsFromBinary()
                                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                        java.io.IOException
        Populates transactions from random access file.
        Returns:
        Array list of Transaction objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if TRANSACTIONS_BINARY doesn't exist.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an error occurs reading file.

      • persistAccounts

        private void persistAccounts()
        Writes the Account objects from memory to the hard drive.

      • persistTransactions

        private void persistTransactions()
        Writes the Transaction objects from memory to the hard drive.
